data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Tiranë, Albania.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tiranë, Albania

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 4,534 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Tiranë
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Tiranë, Albania not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Gorani people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Gorani people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Gorani people is yours.
Lord, make the 4,534 believers in Tiranë to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 744,866 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: There are 749,400 people living in the state of Tiranë. Only about 4,534 might be believers.

data.section_summary:
the state of Tiranë, Albania has a population of 749,400.

We estimate Tiranë has 4,534 people who might know Jesus, 247,573 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 497,293 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 165 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Tiranë, Albania to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.

location.name: Tiranë
